author: jford
msg: Fixed context setup.  Should be "conf" instead of "config".  config is used for i18n

author: jford
msg: Set line width at 0 to prevent text from be formatted differently from user input

author: taylor
msg: - Patch from Todd Gasall to Redirect Portlet. When looking for redirect parameters, it now searches
for session attributes objects (not only strings). If found, it will reflect the object looking
for getter/setters on the object to match the parameter name from the portlet settings.
- Email Portlet enhanced to store state per Portlet instance
- Email Torque generation cleaned up to work with all DBs

author: taylor
msg: 'Minty Blue' Skin -- contributed by Ramil Jason Yao
